bomberman.core.graphics
Class DecoratedWorld

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.logic.LogicWorld
      bomberman.core.graphics.DecoratedWorld

public class DecoratedWorld
extends LogicWorld

The DecoratedWorld class represents the graphics side of the LogicWorld. It instances all necessary decorators for those Entity that logic produces at runtime, manages the graphics aspect and animations for the ground and all Entity through the DecoratedEntityEngine.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
See Also:
LogicWorld, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decorator_pattern
